name: Fallen Sky
description: One of the few surviving creations of the acolytes of the Wyrmforge.

abilities.name: Fallen Sky
abilities.description: Transforms into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after a delay, stunning enemies and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemy units for a while.
notes: Disjoints projectiles and teleports the caster upon cast
The meteor takes 1 second to land. During this period, the caster is invulnerable and hidden
Upon landing, all enemies within the area, including buildings but excluding wards, get damaged, stunned, and receive a damaging debuff
The meteor first applies the debuffs, then the impact damage
Deals damage in 1-second intervals, starting 1 second after the debuff is placed, resulting in 7 total instances, including the impact damage
Can deal a total of 510 damage (before reductions), or 663 damage with Dormant Curio
Multiple casts on the same targets do not stack but refresh the duration instead
Stacks with the debuff of Meteor Hammer
Destroys trees within the radius upon impact
Damage greater than 0 from any player (including allies, excluding self) or Roshan puts Fallen Sky on a 25 second cooldown
The damage cooldown only triggers when Fallen Sky is in its active state in the neutral item slot
Since it is a cooldown and not actually disabled, it can be refreshed with cooldown resetting sources
This cooldown is not affected by cooldown reduction sources
It is also not disabled by damage flagged as HP Removal
Neither shares cooldown with any Blink Dagger-based items or Meteor Hammer

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics
The meteor impact affects buildings as well, stunning and burning them. Buildings take less impact damage
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the damage per second, impact damage, and impact damage against buildings are increased by 30%
Taking more than 0 damage from any other player (after reductions and not flagged as HP Removal) puts the item on a cooldown
